Honeywell Customer Connect
Dear Honeywell Customer, This month I have a lot of news and updates to share. I would like to highlight the Honeywell Conference in Lindon, Utah on October 16th for Bell 407HP operators.
I am always available, so don’t hesitate to contact me for assistance. -- Mark Did You Know?
If you are a Bell407HP Operator, this Utah Operators Conference is for youHoneywell will be holding an HTS900 Operator’s Conference on October 16, 2019 in Lindon, Utah. This conference will bring together the HTS900 engine operators with the Honeywell Product Support Team for technical discussions and collaboration. Also, participating will be our partners: Eagle Copters and Intermountain Turbine Services. If you are a Bell 407HP operator and would like to attend, please contact deta.adams@honeywell.com <[[mailto: deta.adams@honeywell.com]]> for information on how to receive an invitation.
FSE Creates ‘Wow’ Moments for Latin American Operators Field Service Engineer Fernando Vasquez Orellana has spent 20 years solving problems for Honeywell customers in Latin America. Currently based in Toluca, Mexico, Fernando works with business aviation operators in Mexico, Central America and the Caribbean to get them the solutions they need. Here is his story on how he works with customers in Mexico to create those “wow” moments. Read More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/august/fse-creates-wow-moments-for-latin-american-operators]]>. CBM and HUMS <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1pIKFXufkBo&feature=youtu.be]]> Visit MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/HQ002000Z0L0bX00qFI00jG]]> to access the Technical Knowledge Center's thousands of articles and videos to help you solve technical issues, parts ordering, your order status and much more. Spanish and Portuguese Technical Support Numbers Your requests have been answered! The Honeywell Customer and Product Support team is excited to launch technical support phone numbers in the Central and South American regions. Starting in August, Honeywell will now have support for Spanish and Portuguese speakers. Here are the new phone numbers: Mexico - 528004360128 Colombia - 018000125387 Chile - 800395072 Brazil - 080000474059 Technical support made easy and personalized with Direct Access Latest Update It just got easier! Direct Access is one of Honeywell's customer support mobile apps that is available to Business & General Aviation pilots and flight departments. The app is a customer service one-stop-shop that provides aircraft-on-ground (AOG) support, order status information, helicopter support and includes an interactive map of the nearest dealers and service centers. In update 9.0, Honeywell introduced a convenient and personalized mobile experience making it easier to contact technical support and register for the local Operator Conferences. Click here for more information and to download the app <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/direct-access]]>.
